author: timbeiko
content:
Call recap:
- We'll be merging the PR here pretty much as-is as a v1 for 7702 which L1 teams can consider for Pectra/devnet-1: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8561
- In next week, same time, we'll have another breakout call to follow up on (1) potential spec changes, (2) an ERC-standardized version of the proxy contract and (3) best practices for wallets to adopt 7702
